title: 104_s1307
content: The Act titled "Treatment of Indian Tribal Natural Resource Income Act of 1995" addresses the federal tax treatment of income derived by Indians from natural resources activities. It introduces a new section, SEC. 7874, focusing on the federal tax treatment of income derived by Indians from the harvest of tribally owned natural resources. The Act "Treatment of Indian Tribal Natural Resource Income Act of 1995" exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from income and self-employment taxes. It also excludes employment taxes on remuneration for services within natural resources-related activities. The definition of natural resources-related activity includes cultivating, harvesting, processing, extracting, or selling natural resources held in trust by the United States for the tribe. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from certain taxes, with specific criteria for qualifying entities. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from certain taxes. A qualified Indian entity includes an entity with annual gross receipts 90% or more derived from natural resources-related activities of Indian tribes owning at least 10% equity interests in the entity. Distributions from a qualified Indian entity to a tribe member are treated as derived from natural resources-related activities. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities by Indian tribes or qualified entities from certain taxes. Distributions to tribe members are treated as derived from natural resources activities. No inference is created regarding tax exemptions for income from tribal rights secured before January 1, 1995. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities by Indian tribes or qualified entities from certain taxes. The amendments made by this section regarding federal tax treatment of income derived by Indians from the harvest of tribally owned natural resources apply to periods before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
